channel.title: Understanding how to get server online [pretty urgent]
channel.description: ok so ive followed every tutorial i could find ive done every possable thing i could think of but i still cant get my server online i need someone whos willing to explain step by step of what i need to do thanks =)

item.title: Understanding how to get server online [pretty urgent]
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

[quote=“Fox0wnage, post:8, topic:327796”]Firstly, use the Port Checker to make sure your port is open.
Second go to Gui.java and search for the server ip and replace it with yours. It should allow people to connect after that, if you release your client.[/quote]

i did that and it still wont work

Read full topic
item.source: Understanding how to get server online [pretty urgent]

item.source: Understanding how to get server online [pretty urgent]

item.title: Understanding how to get server online [pretty urgent]
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Firstly, use the Port Checker to make sure your port is open.
Second go to Gui.java and search for the server ip and replace it with yours. It should allow people to connect after that, if you release your client.

Read full topic

item.title: Understanding how to get server online [pretty urgent]
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

You need to Port Forward and set your client to connect to your IP. I suggest using a No-IP (www.no-ip.com)

Read full topic
